FuncDef: This command configures how the Ethernet Tunnel group SAP queue and virtual scheduler buffering and rate parameters are adapted over multiple active MDAs.

ParaDef.Info: Each MDA will receive a fraction of the SAP and scheduler parameters.
The Ethernet Tunnel group will create the SAP queues and virtual schedulers with the actual parameters on each MDA.
Places the LAG instance into a mode that enforces QoS bandwidth constraints in the following manner:.
